des:
Control your Gingeray's lights, curtains, thermostats, alarm sensors, and temperature sensors with easy-to-use voice commands . After a few easy setup steps you can control your smart devices with simple statements like:

For Lights:
Alexa, turn on Bedroom light
Alexa, turn off Kitchen lights
Alexa, set bookroom light to 50%
Alexa, dim the Bedroom
Alexa, brighten Bedroom

For Scenes:
Alexa, turn on Arm
Alexa, turn off Disarm

For Thermostats:
Alexa, set Upstairs to 25 degrees
Alexa, increase Masterroom temperature

HOW TO GET CONNECTED
Step A: In ZGingerMini app
1. Set up you all devices in ZGingerMini app
2. Bind your Amazon Account in 'Gateway Setting'-'Voice Command'-'Amazon Echo'-'Bind'
3. 'Cloud Synchronize' to upload your Data to cloud

Step B: In Amazon Alexa app
1. Find 'ZGinger HA Skill', Tap the "Enable" button
2. Enter your Amazon username and password
3. After successfully connecting to your Amazon account, talk to your Echo and say, "Alexa, discover devices".

Note: When using the skill, you need to specify the name of thermostat or light you want to use. Device names can be changed in your ZGinger Mini app.
